level.heading: Commissioner of finance to keep accounts.
level.text: ยง 11-104 Commissioner of finance to keep accounts. a. The commissioner of finance shall keep books showing the receipts of moneys from all sources, and designating the sources of same, and also showing the amounts paid from time to time on account of the several appropriations, the forms of which shall be prescribed by the comptroller. b. The city collector or the deputy collector in each borough office of the city collector, in receiving monies payable to the city, from whatever source derived, shall not issue a receipt to the payor for a payment made by personal, business or corporate check unless specifically requested.
